title: Inactive accounts names
body: Hey, was just wondering if there was a process in which inactive accounts names could be taken just like with inactive ranked teams, as a lot of really cool summoner names are held by inactive level 1 -15 accounts

replies.body:
Names are protected for 1 month per level (6 months minimum), and after inactivity for that long the name is up for grabs through account creation or name change.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751914-Summoner-Name-Clean-Up-

If you need assistance with a name change, please submit a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

Wait.  If im inactive for a month to six I could come back with my name taken?
Edit
Right per level ok Im stupid
Just wondering, what do you want to name change to?
There were a few i was tossing up between, Summoner 6 for example, decided on 'VeganCrossfitter'
http://lolinactive.com/ you can use this to see if/when a name is available
